page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The main type of employment in this area is associated with agriculture. In the past there were large numbers of men employed on the land as well as work for the seasonal worker (mainly harvest time). Today, however the opportunities are not as good. As farming has become more and more machine intensive the numbers of men required has been drastically reduced. Their output has actually increased at the same time as one man can do much more work with the help of machines. Also the number of farms in the area has declined leaving fewer but larger farms thus reducing the opportunities still further. In the area there is one small processing industry employing a handfull of people.
